Class Portfolio

java.lang.Object
Portfolio
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Portfolio extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a financial portfolio for an investor, including owned assets and linked bank accounts.
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Portfolio()
    Constructs a new Portfolio with empty asset and bank account lists.

    • searchForAsset

      public Asset searchForAsset(String name)
      Searches for an asset in the portfolio by name.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the asset.
      Returns:
      The Asset object if found, or null otherwise.

    • sellFromAsset

      public void sellFromAsset(double percentage, int index)
      Sells a percentage of the asset at the specified index.
      Parameters:
      percentage - Percentage of the asset to sell.
      index - Index of the asset in the list (0-based).

    • calculateTotalValue
